body:
Comment 6: 
Ah, EnumValues returns 64-bit integer,

// A Type collects information about a type in both the C and Go worlds.
type Type struct {
        Size       int64
        Align      int64
        C          *TypeRepr
        Go         ast.Expr
        EnumValues map[string]int64
}

then,

gcc.go:L604: n.Const = fmt.Sprintf("%#x", n.Type.EnumValues[k])

hmm...
